profile:
Smooth Ceiling Ltd
Smooth Ceiling specializes in removing stipple, other know as stucco/popcorn from your ceilings. 
Our team take pride in the work we do and we ourselves on making sure we get the job done right, and on your time schedule. Each area is covered and protected from floor to ceiling to ensure that dust does not seep through out the house. We specialize in turning your stucco ceiling to a smooth and perfect finish. 
We're dedicated to providing you the resources and services you need to modernize your home., 
We remove your outdated popcorn ceiling in a fast, clean and efficient manner.
Acoustic ceiling also known as the "popcorn ceiling" was in fashion over thirty years ago, but now new houses do not have these ceilings unless you request it prior to a new home being built.
Many home owners are also removing the stipple in their homes for benefits such as

Many benefits to the removal of Popcorn/Acoustic Ceilings:
	•	Brightens the room 
	•	Increase Re-sale Value
	•	Damage Control
        •	Modernizes the look      
	•	Less Dust and les Spider Webs
	•	Cleaner, Professional Look
	•	And much more…

Popcorn Ceiling Removal / Stucco Removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
service_area: Richmond Hill, Markham, Thornhill, Vaughn, Woodbridge, Toronto,  Stoufville, Kleinburg, Maple, KIng City. North York, Scarborough, Etobicoke
services: Popcorn ceiling removal / stucco removal - Painting - Water Damaged Ceilings - Drywall Repairs - Pot Lights- Crown Moulding-Custom Kitchens-Custom Closets
brands: Smooth Ceiling Ltd works with the highest quality of material such as  Benjamin Moore CGC plaster, Anchore protective Paper etc
specialities: We specialize in transforming your rough outdated ceiling into a  work of art.  We make sure that we meet your budget and time line. We protect your floors and walls from top to bottom to ensure that the dust does not seep into other rooms nor your furnace. We close off your vents and air intakes.  We use a wet method to remove the stucco "popcorn", then apply multiple coats of plaster to you're ceiling to insure the stability and longevity. We then use an LED to double check for any imperfections we might of missed. We feather sand the ceiling to a smooth finish and proceed by priming and painting the project with a top Benjamin Moore prime and paint. We finish the job by cleaning the work area and disposing the garbage.
name: Smooth Ceiling Ltd

profile:
Ceiling Champions services the GTA and surrounding area's for stucco "popcorn" removal, repair, and refinishing of ceilings. We also can provide you with Crown Moulding, Painting, and PotLights. We also renovate Kitchens, Bathroom, and Cabinet Designs.

Ceiling Champions are here to restore or improve your ceiling or renovation project to 100% and beyond. Our top quality workmanship and attention to detail continue to earn confidence with homeowners in the GTA.

If you’re in the GTA; Etobicoke, Mississauga, Brampton, Ajax, Pickering, Oakville or nearby area, please give us a call to discuss stucco removal, ceiling repair, custom closets, kitchens & bathrooms, Crown Moulding or any other drywall related renovation.

profile:
Why Choose House & Condo Painters?
 
Here at House & Condo Painters we are proud to say that we are one of the best Residential and Commercial Painting Contractors in Toronto. With over 25 years experience, we promise our clients to provide the highest quality painting and contracting services at highly competitive rates. We guarantee by the end of the project you will have an environment as unique as you!
 
To make this possible we offer to all clients:    
Outstanding Customer Service: Our staff are available to answer any and all of your questions. Your inquiries will be responded quickly, and regardless of your schedule!
 
Free In-Home Colour Consultations: House & Condo Painters specially provide free colour consultation before starting the job. We will give you our professional opinion on the colour and finish combinations that will make your home as you dream!
 
Following “Eco-Friendly” Processes: We only use high-quality trusted products to deliver the best results for your home. Often working with brands such as Benjamin Moore, Sherwin Williams, Behr, Dulux, Para, and more! We prioritize the use of paints with low VOCs to address any potential environmental concerns. Any leftover paint is saved for touch-ups, recycled  or donated to charity to minimize any unneeded waste.
 
Experienced Professionals: At House & Condo Painters we only hire professional, skilled painters for all of our projects. This helps us to ensure that the work we provide is of the highest quality and completed within the shortest amount of time.

profile:
About Us
Owner – Benny Leigh

I served my time as an apprentice plasterer in Ireland achieving an NVQ Level 2, a certificate in EIFS Technician, and successfully ran my own plastering business for many years. I now have over 20 years experience working in my trade. Over those years I have perfected my skill and am proud and confident in every job I do and have become a master at my craft. Since arriving in Canada I have worked in the Ceiling Stucco Removal Business and I am looking forward to working with new clients all over the GTA and showing them workmanship at the highest standard. I can guarantee a 100% satisfaction.

Our Goal and Mission to  our Clients

My team of men are highly qualified tradesmen who take pride in their work. The secret in our skill is attention to detail which we offer at the highest level.

Every home we do features a unique tailor-made change that we can offer to suit your budget.

Benny’s Ceiling Stucco Removal is proud of our reputation of completing jobs on time and on budget, with the highest quality of workmanship and cleanliness.

When it comes to plastering your home don’t leave it to amateurs or less experienced companies. A major renovation such as this should be done by professionals.
